title: Generate Pin for player
custom_preconds:
- Registration period is open 
- Log in as BOC or MLSB 
- Locate Pin Generator Widget
custom_steps:
1. Click edit 
2. Click Add row 
3. Fill in required fields (use a valid email address) 
4. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. Pin Generator widget loads into edit mode 
2. New row is added to the widget with blank fields 
3. Fields work as expected 
4. Information is saved. Pin is generated under Pin Number column

title: Send email to player (English)
custom_steps:
1. Click checkbox next to name in the new row added in [C59826]
2. Click Send email 
3. View Email
custom_expected:
1. Checkbox populated 
2. Email sent to email used in [C59826] 
3. Contents: 

Subject: Major League Baseball (MLB) International Prospect Registration
 
Dear %firstName %lastName,
 
In order to register for the %yrShort signing period, please enter www.website.com and sign in using the following pin number: ######.  Detailed instructions on how to register, including which documents must be uploaded to complete the process, can be found on the website.  
 
Please be aware that you will not be officially registered with MLB until your profile has been reviewed and verified by MLB.  If your registration is verified by MLB, a confirmation email will be sent to the provided email address.  
 
If your registration cannot be verified by MLB then an email will be sent to the provided email address with instructions on how to correct and re-submit your registration profile.  Your registration will not be complete until MLB verifies the corrected profile. If your corrected registration profile is verified by MLB, a confirmation email will be sent to the provided email address.  
 
If you do not receive a confirmation email for your registration, or if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us at registration@mlb.com or (809) 518-2233.

title: Send email to Player (Spanish)
custom_preconds:
Repeat [C59826] but Home Country must be set to one of the following:
- Dominican Republic
- Venezuela
- Panama
- Colombia
- Mexico
- Nicaragua
- Argentina
- Spain
- Costa Rica
- Ecuador
- El Salvador
- Guatemala
- Honduras
- Peru
custom_steps:
1. Click check box next to player name whose Home Country is set to one of the countries listed in Preconditions 
2. Click Send Email
3. View email
custom_expected:
1. Check box is clicked 
2. System generates an email for each selected player containing their unique login url and pin number and sends each player an email to the email address entered. 
3. Email Contents: 
 Subject: Major League Baseball (MLB) Registro Internacional del Prospecto 

%firstName %lastName,

Para registrarse en el período de firma %yrShort, por favor entrar a www.website.com e iniciar sesión utilizando el siguiente número de pin: # # # # # #. Las instrucciones detalladas sobre cómo registrarse, incluyendo los documentos que se deben subir para completar el proceso, se pueden encontrar en el sitio web.
 
Favor tomar en cuenta que usted no estará registrado oficialmente con MLB hasta que su perfil haya sido revisado y verificado por la MLB. Si su registro es verificado por MLB, un correo electrónico de confirmación será enviado a la dirección de correo electrónico proporcionada.
 
Si el registro no puede ser verificado por MLB un correo electrónico será enviado a la dirección de correo electrónico proporcionado con instrucciones sobre cómo corregir y volver a enviar su perfil de registro. Su registro no estará completo hasta que MLB verifique el perfil corregido. Si su perfil de registro corregido es verificado por MLB, un correo electrónico de confirmación será enviado a la dirección de correo electrónico proporcionada.
 
Si usted no recibe un correo electrónico de confirmación de su registro, o si tiene alguna pregunta, por favor no dude en ponerse en contacto con nosotros al correo electrónico registration@mlb.com o (809) 518-2233.

title: Log in to the Self Reg site
custom_preconds: Unique Pin has been sent to player
custom_steps:
1. Log in Self Registration Site
2. Enter PIN and click Log In
custom_expected:
1. Self registration is displayed, with one field to enter their PIN and a Login button
2. Upon successful login player will redirected to player submission form. The current status of the form should "Not Yet Submitted" and a blank form for the player to fill in should be visible.

title: Download a Consent Form
custom_steps:
1. Hover over "Consent Forms"
2. Select a Consent Form
custom_expected:
1. Verify that the correct consent forms are displayed for the users Country. 
2. Verify that the consent form is downloaded

title: Residency Review Questions
custom_steps:
1. Following question appears in Bio Section, "Has the player ever been to Canada or any of the 50 states of the USA, the District of Columbia(Washington,DC), Puerto Rico , or any other Commonwealth Territory or Possession of the United States of America?"
2. Select Yes
3. Enter text into Residency review questions 
4. Click Submit
custom_expected:
1. User can toggle between radio buttons
2. More questions appear: 
- How many times has the player been to any of the above locations? 
- How long was the player's longest stay in any of the above locations? 
- Please provide the date of the last stay and any additional relevant information that the player provided concerning the above questions
3. User enters text 
4. User receives error message that only numeric values are accepted. (Error message will also contain required fields that have not been filled out)

title: Add Action Button
custom_steps:
1. Click Add on National ID section
2. Click Trash Can next to additional National ID
3. Click Add on Player's Address Section
4. Click Trash can next to additional address
5. Click add on Player's Phone Section
6. Click Trash can on additional phone
7. Click Add on Player's Email section
8. Click Trash Can next to additional email
custom_expected:
1. Additional fields present 
2. Additional fields deleted 
3. Additional fields present 
4. Additional fields deleted 
5. Additional fields present 
6. Additional fields deleted 
7. Additional fields present 
8. Additional fields deleted

title: Fill out National ID
custom_steps:
1. Select a Country from Dropdown
2. Enter a National ID
custom_expected:
1. A list of countries should be available to select
2. User should be able to enter the National ID

title: Fill out Trainer/Agent Section
custom_steps:
1. Verify the fields under Trainer/Agent/League Information Section
2. Fill in all required fields
custom_expected:
1. Following fields should be displayed and all should be editable
- Type
- Name
- Phone Country Code
- Phone Number
- Email
2. All fields should work appropriately and data entered should be visible

title: Fill out Address Section
custom_steps:
1. Locate Address(es) Section 
2. Fill in fields
custom_expected:
1. Following fields should be displayed and all should be editable
- Type- Default is set to Home 
- Country
- Address Line 1
- Address Line 2
- Address Line 3
- City
- State
- Sector
- Make Primary - Radio button
2. All fields should work appropriately and data entered should be visible

title: Fill out Phone Number(s) Section
custom_steps:
1. Verify the fields in Phone Number(s) section
2. Fill in fields
custom_expected:
1. Following fields should be displayed and all should be editable
- Type
- Country
- Phone number
- Make Primary - Radio button
2. All fields should work appropriately and data entered should be visible

title: Fill out Email Section
custom_steps:
1. Verify the fields in E-mail Address(es) section
2. Fill in fields. Enter a Valid Email Address (will be used for verification later on)
custom_expected:
1. Following fields should be displayed and all should be editable
- Type
- Email
- Make Primary Radio button
2. All fields should work appropriately and data entered should be visible

title: Upload and delete files
custom_steps:
1. Click Add File button 
2. Select File to upload 
3. Click Trash Can
4. Click Yes on "Are you sure?" prompt 
5. Repeat steps 1 and 2 
6. Attach labels
custom_expected:
1. Pop up displays showing files on computer to select 
2. File is uploaded to section 
3. "Are you sure?" prompt displays telling that file will be permanently deleted 
4. File is deleted 
5. Results of step 1 and 2 
6. Labels are successfully attached. User can add more than one label to a file

title: Make sure comments are attached
custom_steps:
1. Add a comments to the uploaded file
2. Click Save
3. Hover over Comment Icon
custom_expected:
1. Clicking the comments icon should display a popup window for user to enter comments
2. Clicking save should attach the comment to the file
3. Hovering over comments icon should display a pop up with the comment

title: Submit Profile to BOC
custom_preconds:
[C56465]
All required fields have been filled out
custom_steps:
1. Click Submit
2. Log Out
custom_expected:
1. A notification should display to user to say their form has been submitted. This Status on the form should now be "Pending BOC Review". The player should not be able to edit the form. It should be displayed in read only mode.
2. Player should be logged out and redirected to Log In page

title: User can log back in but make no changes to my submission
custom_steps:
1. Log in Self Registration Site
2. Enter PIN used in [C56465] and Log In
3. Verify form
custom_expected:
1. Self registration is displayed, with one field to enter their PIN and a Login button
2. Upon successful login player will redirected to player submission form in view mode. The current status of the form should "Pending BOC Review".
3. The player should be locked out from making any changes to the form.

title: Set First Review to Correction needed
custom_preconds:
[C56480]
Log in as BOC and locate Reg Admin widget
custom_steps:
1. Find Self Reg Player from [C56480]
4. Open Player profile
5. Click Edit
6. Locate Registration Reviews section
7. Select any Correction-Needed options for the first review
8. Click Save
custom_expected:
1. BOC dashboard should be displayed
2. Registration Admin widget should be visible
3. The Self Reg player should be visible in the list
4. Player profile should be opened in read only mode. Data from Self Registration form should have been populated in to the profile.
5. Profile should go into edit mode
6. Registration Reviews section should be visible now in edit mode.
7. There should be a list of options to choose from, user should be able to select one of the correction needed statements.
8. Profile status should be updated to "Correction-Needed" and an Email should be generated and sent to the Player

title: Check the contents of the email is correct (English)
custom_steps:
1. Log in to Email, find and open email
2. Verify contents of email
custom_expected:
1. Email should have been sent to the player
2. Email should have the following contents and populated in the relevant places with the Player Data:

Subject: Correction Needed Ð Major League Baseball (MLB) International Prospect Registration

Dear %firstName %lastName, 

Your registration with Major League Baseball has been reviewed but cannot be verified by MLB due to the following reason: %CorrectionNeededComments.

Please enter display player's unique URL here and sign in using the pin number Player's unique Pin in order to correct your registration profile and re-submit it for review by MLB.

Your registration will not be complete until the necessary corrections are made and the profile is verified by an MLB employee. If your registration is verified, a confirmation email will be sent to the provided email address. If your registration still cannot be verified then an email will be sent to the provided email address with instructions on how to correct your registration profile. 

If you do not receive a confirmation email for your re-submitted registration, or if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us at registration@mlb.com or (809) 518-2233.

title: Check the contents of the email is correct (Spanish)
custom_preconds:
Submit player profile to BOC. Home country must be set to one of the following: 
·         Dominican Republic
·         Venezuela
·         Panama
·         Colombia
·         Mexico
·         Nicaragua
·         Argentina
·         Spain
·         Costa Rica
·         Ecuador
·         El Salvador
·         Guatemala
·         Honduras
·         Peru

Then complete [C56482]
custom_steps:
1. Log in to Email, find and open email
2. Verify contents of email
custom_expected:
1. Email should have been sent to the player
2. Email should have the following contents and populated in the relevant places with the Player Data:

Subject: Corrección requerida - Major League Baseball (MLB) Registro internacional del prospecto.

Estimado %firstName %lastName, 

Su registro con Major League Baseball (MLB) ha sido revisado, pero no puede ser verificado por MLB debido a lo siguiente: %CorrectionNeededComments.

Por favor entre a display player's unique URL here y abrir una sesión utilizando el número de pin Player's unique Pin con el fin de corregir su perfil de registro y volver a enviarlo para su revisión por parte de MLB. 

Su inscripción no está completa hasta que las correcciones necesarias se realicen y el perfil sea verificado por un empleado de MLB. Si se verifica su inscripción, un correo electrónico de confirmación será enviado a la dirección de correo electrónico proporcionada. Si el registro aún no se puede verificar, un correo electrónico será enviado a la dirección de correo electrónico proporcionada con instrucciones sobre cómo corregir su perfil de registro. 

Si usted no recibe un correo electrónico de confirmación de su registro, o si tiene alguna pregunta, no dude en ponerse en contacto con nosotros en registro@mlb.com o (809) 518-2233.

title: Verify I can log into system to update submission
custom_preconds:
Player has received Correction Needed email 
Still has Pin used in [C56465]
custom_steps:
1. Log in Self Registration Site
2. Enter PIN and Log In
3. Make updates to profile
custom_expected:
1. Self registration is displayed, with one field to enter their PIN and a Login button
2. System displays the player's submitted profile in Edit Mode with all fields locked for editing with the exception of the Contact Information and the Attached Files section. 
3. User able to update Contact Information and Attached files section

title: Resubmitted to BOC for verification
custom_steps:
1. Verify Contact Infomation and Attached Files are editable
2. Update information
3. Click Submit
custom_expected:
1. ONLY Contact Information and Attached files should be editable. Everything else should be locked.
2. Fields and files work appropriately
3. Form should be resubmitted to BOC. Status for the Player should change to "Submitted". BOC Registration Status should now be set to "Resubmitted to BOC"

title: Update Status to Incomplete
custom_steps:
1. Fill out the following fields:
- First Name
- Last Name
- Middle Name
- Extended Last Name
- Home Country
- Birth Date
- Birth Country
2. Click Submit
3. Click Back
4. Log out
custom_expected:
1. All fields should populated correctly.
2. Verify that user is prompted with an error indicating that they have failed to submit a complete profile. A list of ALL requried fileds that are not filled in will be listed. Dismissing this Error will produce another promp asking if user wants to save the profile.
3. Profile Status updates to Incomplete. It should appear in the BOC's Registration Admin widget with a Registration Status of "Incomplete". 
4. Player should be logged out and returned to Login page

title: Verify I can log into system to complete an Incomplete submission
custom_steps:
1. Log in Self Registration Site
2. Enter PIN and Log In
3. Fill out form
custom_expected:
1. Self registration is displayed, with one field to enter their PIN and a Login button
2. Upon successful login player will redirected to player submission form. The current status of the form should "Incomplete". All areas of the form should be editable.

title: Verify that an Incomplete submission with the MINIMUM required fields filled out appears on system
custom_steps:
1. Log in as BOC
2. Locate Registration Admin widget
3. Find Player that submitted incomplete profile
4. Open profile
custom_expected:
1. BOC dashboard is displayed
2. Registration Admin widget should be visible
3. Player should be visible in the widget
4. Profile should be opened and the Registration Status should be set to "Incomplete"

title: Verify that all elements are translated correctly
custom_steps:
1. Log in Self Registration Site
2. Enter PIN and Log In
3. Hover Spanish and select Espanol
custom_expected:
1. Self registration is displayed, with one field to enter their PIN and a Login button
2. Upon successful login player will redirected to player submission form.
3. The site should be reloaded in Spanish

title: Verify that all elements are translated correctly
custom_steps:
1. Log in Self Registration Site
2. Enter PIN and Log In
3. Hover English and select English
custom_expected:
1. Self registration is displayed, with one field to enter their PIN and a Login button
2. Upon successful login player will redirected to player submission form.
3. The site should be reloaded in English

title: Send Help Email
custom_steps:
1. Log in Self Registration Site
2. Enter PIN and Log In
3. Click Help
4. Fill out "Email Us" form
5. Click Send
custom_expected:
1. Self registration is displayed, with one field to enter their PIN and a Login button
2. Upon successful login player will redirected to player submission form.
3. Verify Help page is loaded. 
4. All fields work appropriately
5. A message should be displayed to indicate that the email was sucessfully sent.

title: Verify system does not allow this invalid Birth Date
custom_steps:
1. Log in Self Registration Site
2. Enter PIN and Log In
3. Fill out the form but enter the Birth Date as 02/30/2000
4. Click Submit
custom_expected:
1. Self registration is displayed, with one field to enter their PIN and a Login button
2. Upon successful login player will redirected to player submission form.
3. All fields should work appropriately. The Birth Date should state 02/30/2000
4. Verify error for Birth Date being invalid. If profile is saved verify on BOC what Birth Date has been saved

title: Verify system does not allow this invalid Email Address
custom_steps:
1. Go to External Site and Log In
2. Fill out the form but enter an email address with the @ missing
3. Click Submit
custom_expected:
1. External site is loaded and user is redirected to external user's home page
2. All fields should work appropriately. One of the email fields the email address should have the @ symbol missing
3. Verify error for Email being invalid.

title: Verify the player profile is deleted from the system and cannot be searched for
custom_steps:
1. Search for and open a player profile that was submitted via self registration 
2. Delete the profile by clicking the Delete button at the bottom of the profile and click Yes to the confirmation message
3. Search for the deleted player via Quick Search
4. Search for the deleted player via Advanced Search
custom_expected:
1. Player profile is loaded
2. After clicking the delete button you should recieve a confirmation message asking if you're sure you want to delete the player. After clicking Yes to the confirmation message the home dashboard should load
3. The player should not be able to be viewed via Quick Search
4. The player should not be be able to viewed via Advanced Search
